##

Let us bring the bar to you!

Learn more about our services at The Little Boozie Bar LLC and book us for
your next event when you get in touch.

##

The Drinks Are on Us!

It’s time to turn up and party hard with The Little Boozie Bar! You haven’t
seen anything quite like our vintage horse trailer

 mobile bars for events in and around Northeast Ohio. Not enough rooms to fit
our trailer bars? No problem! We offer bartending services with our wooden
stationary bar, or just simply our bartending services.

#

We are available for:

  * Weddings
  * Bridal Showers
  * Bachelorette/Bachelor parties

  * Birthday Parties
  * Private Events
  * Corporate Events
  * And more!

###

History and bio.

I have been bartending at big bars since I was of age and I would love when I
got the opportunity to go do special events whether they were golf outings,
weddings, private parties, or huge corporate events! Traveling around and
meeting new people while helping them improve their events has always been a
thrill so I figured why not make a fun and exciting business out of something
that I have always loved!

  

The events that I have done I would sometimes have to use these tiny bars that
they supplied and could hardly move around, so that is when I got the idea of
creating my own and bringing it and everything needed to mix and pour with me!

  

This vintage horse trailer that is being converted into the mobile bar will
give me so many opportunities to serve at events in the BEST way possible, not
to mention it will be so unique and quite the eye catcher when it is finished
along with a more stationary bar option that will be hand made as well for
those indoor events!

  

I will also have signature drink menus for literally EVERY holiday/occasion if
the client wanted to spruce up their event and add a few to their events drink
menu! As well as any other drinks of their choices! If I don’t have a menu
made for your type of event theme, ask me I will put one together for your
occasion!

####

Mission Statement

We aim to help you host a memorable and worry-free event full of life and fun.
